DOC.brief_summary: The study open label one include 30 patient underwent ischemic stroke 3 month 3 year prior study . All patient undergone baseline brain SPECT perfusion study . 15 patient take one dose 20 mg cialis , second brain SPECT 24 hour cialis administration . 15 patient ( age risk factor match ) prescribe 5 mg cialis daily 7 day , second SPECT study perform 24 hour last dose .
DOC.brief_title: Brain SPECT Following Cialis ( Tadalafil ) Administration
DOC.criteria: Male female patient age range 3575 year . 1. know allergic reaction TF 2 . Medical contraindication use TF 3 . Hemorrhagic stroke include intracerebral hemorrhage subarachnoid hemorrhage 4 . Acute stroke cardiac ischemic event 3 month prior study . 5 . Other neurological brain disease include degenerative disease , multiple sclerosis , brain tumor , post severe brain injury ( TBI ) migraine headache . 6 . Sensory aphasia . 7 . Cognitive impairment disability sign consent form.Patients ' Assessment
